name: Guild Masters - A true Social RPG game on Facebook
blurb: Guild Masters is the first and only Facebook game that actually is a RPG. And this is more than a MMORPG... this is a Social RPG!

rewards.reward: THANKS - Every dollar counts! Have our most sincere gratitude. We will keep all backers updated with the latest news and they will be invited for the beta-testing.\r\n\r\nAlso you will receive your contribution's value in diamonds, the Guild Master's currency, at the standard price (20 diamonds per dollar).

CARD - We will sent you by email our special thanks in a digital gratitude card with a illustration from our main artist.\r\nAlso you will receive your contribution's value in diamonds, as mentioned above.

WALLPAPER  + CREDITS \u2013 You will be shown at the game CREDITS, at the special thanks section, descending ordered by contribution amount. We will also send you a high resolution WALLPAPER of Guild Masters, in addition to the emailed digital card and the diamonds correspondent to the amount pledged (300 diamonds for a $15 pledge).

INSIGNIA (reduced price) - An insignia identifying you as "Benefactor" of the game, will be shown at your Guild Master's profile. This will increase your prestige, very important in our social RPG!\r\nAlso you will receive ALL ABOVE. This plegde has a reduced price of $25 instead $30 for the first 50 benefactors.

INSIGNIA + POSTAL - An INSIGNIA identifying you as Benefactor of the game, will be shown at your Guild Master's profile. This will increase your prestige, very important in our social RPG!\r\n\r\nFurthermore, we will mail to your home you our very special thanks, with a full-color, photo-quality, glossy POSTAL signed by the creator of the game and founder of Otherwind. Also you will receive ALL ABOVE as these are cumulative rewards.

STARTER KIT - You will receive in-game equipment for your character to have a nice start in the game. Please refer to the reward section for more eventual information about this equipment. Also you will receive ALL ABOVE.

Yes, we made T-Shirts! And they look amazing with our artwork! Refer to the rewards section in the text body to see our pictures, models, options and sizes. Shipping costs are free for anywhere in the world! As every reward, this is cumulative with ALL ABOVE.

STARTER KIT ADVANCED: You will receive an advanced set of items, valued at $50, to keep with the nice start when you eran levels and the starter kit of above (received too) will be obsolete.\r\nAlso you will receive ALL ABOVE.

SKETCH + EXCLUSIVE MOUNT - You will receive MOUNT non purchasable in the game, EXCLUSIVE only for our backers.

Also in exclusive for our backers, we will mail to your home HAND-MADE SKETCHES signed by Jacobo, our star artist. Keep an eye over our rewards section on the text body to see some instances of these sketches.

Of course, you will also receive ALL ABOVE.

CAP + STARTER KIT PREMIUM: You will receive a premium set of items to prolong for months the nice start when you earn levels and both starter kits of above (received too) will be obsolete. Also as our truly special gratitude, we will send an amazing embroidered CAP for you! Watch over the rewards section on the text body to learn more about the premium kit and to choose the color of your cap. Of course, you will also get ALL ABOVE.

PREMIUM + AVATAR - You will get ONE YEAR PREMIUM SUBSCRIPTION (valued at $240). See the FAQ at the bottom of the screen to learn more about premium BENEFITS. Also you will receive a special avatar only for premium backers. All other players share the same avatar, only customizable by hair and skin color, so this EXCLUSIVE AVATAR will increase greatly their prestige for other players in the game and, consequently, your power. Also you will receive ALL ABOVE.
CUSTOMIZED AVATAR (Early Bird)- Same than next reward, but at a reduced amount for the first backer getting this reward.

We will ship you an ORIGINAL GAME ILLUSTRATION size A4 (11.69 in \u00d7 8.27 in) or B4 (9.84 in \u00d7 13.90 in), signed by the artist. If our game is a great success, what would be the value of these originals? Also you will receive ALL ABOVE. Please go to http://www.otherwind.com/illustrations_01.php to choose your illustration and send us a message so we can mark it as \u2018not available\u2019. Hurry up before somebody else took the one you like!
GRAND COLLECTOR \u2013 Same as collector rewards but you will get TWO GAME ILLUSTRATIONS instead only one.

CO-FOUNDER - You will be mentioned as co-founder of the game! You will flaunt an INSIGNIA identifying you as CO-FOUNDER at your profile, maximizing your prestige toward all other players. As co-founder you will enjoy a LIFETIME premium subscription and, of course, you will also receive ALL ABOVE including the two signed game illustrations. Don\u2019t forget to tell us your choices!
